name: GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES
description: “GAROU: MARK OF THE WOLVES”, the latest entry in the legendary "FATAL FURY" Series which still continues to fascinate players around the world to this day, returns for a new fight on Steam!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Pentium 4 2.4Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
